actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service, H. Rept. 96-488.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that owners of motor vehicles leased by the United States Postal Service shall be exempt from the payment of State taxes and fees on those vehicles.

summary.text: Exempts the owner of any motor vehicle leased by the United States Postal Service from payment of any State or local tax or fee on such vehicle.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that owners of motor vehicles leased by the United States Postal Service shall be exempt from the payment of State taxes and fees on those vehicles.
